hero.heading:
Your Hair,
Our Artistry
hero.subHeading: One client at a time. Because you deserve undivided attention & care.

about.label: Our Story
about.title: Where Beauty Meets Intention
paragraphs: At Diverse Hair Designs by Peachie, we believe every visit should feel like a personal retreat. Our approach is simple yet rare in today's fast-paced world — we dedicate our full attention to one client at a time.
From precision cuts to transformative color work, every service is performed with meticulous care and artistic vision. Your hair tells your story — we're here to make sure it's beautifully told.
about.quote: We find it very important that our clients feel empowered, and embrace the importance of self care.

items.name: Full Balayage
items.desc: Fully customized to your hair needs. Low maintenance vs traditional highlights. Includes root melting, toner glaze, hydration treatment, haircut & style.

items.name: Partial Highlights
items.desc: Add dimension and brightness with vibrant highlights that frame your face. Includes root melting, toner & style.

items.name: Single Process Color
items.desc: All-over color where the entire head of hair is dyed in a single shade.

items.name: Root Touch-Up / Gray Coverage
items.desc: For pre-existing color or gray coverage. Single color process, max 8 weeks maintenance regrowth (at least 2 inches).

items.name: Color Correction
items.desc: Designed to fix unwanted hair color from box dye, fading, or a desire for a new transformation.

items.name: Updos & Special Occasion
items.desc: From classic updos to flowing curls — styled for your special occasion.

items.name: Scalp Treatment
items.desc: Total scalp detox — exfoliate dead skin, remove buildup. Includes scalp scan analysis, deep cleansing, hair mask, massage & blow dry.

items.name: Smoothing Treatment
items.desc: Infuses amino acids, proteins, silk & pearl. Results last 4–5 months. Short $220 · Medium $250 · Long $300.

testimonials.text: Peachie has completely transformed my hair and my confidence. The one-on-one attention makes you feel like the only person in the world. I wouldn't trust anyone else with my color.
testimonials.author: Satisfied Client

testimonials.text: The best salon experience I've ever had. No rushing, no distractions — just pure artistry and genuine care. My balayage has never looked better.
testimonials.author: Loyal Client

testimonials.text: Walking into Diverse Hair Designs feels like walking into a sanctuary. Peachie listens, understands, and always delivers beyond expectations. Truly a gem in North Carolina.
testimonials.author: Happy Client

staff.name: Peachie Flower
bio: Our salon is owned and operated by Peachie.

Peachie is a hairstylist that specializes in haircutting, coloring — such as balayage, highlights, ombré and color correction. She is certified in American Smoothing Treatment and Japanese Straightening with 14 years of experience in the hair industry. She graduated in 2010 with a degree in cosmetology at Paul Mitchell the School of Fayetteville.
staff.quote: Her passion for hairstyling stems from a deep desire to find joy in creativity while making a meaningful difference in people's lives. Hair is more than just hair — it is a part of our identity, culture, and life experience.

newsletter.heading: Stay Connected
newsletter.subtext: Join our newsletter for exclusive offers, styling tips, and the latest from our salon.
